name: og-easy
description: The og-easy package provides a simple and easy-to-use API for getting Open Graph data. It is a Node.js package for retrieving Open Graph metadata from a given URL, if no data is found, It will parse the html to find a proper intuitive replacement. The package uses Axios for HTTP requests and Cheerio for HTML parsing. With opengraph-preview, you can quickly extract information about the title, description, image, and URL of a web page and use it in your Node.js application. This package is perfect for developers looking to enhance their backend with Open Graph data, or to build tools that require access to metadata from external websites.
